{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Tindómiel | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]], [[Quenya]] and [[Sindarin]] | birth=After {{SA|61}} | birthlocation=[[Númenor]] | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Elros]] | siblings=[[Vardamir]], [[Manwendil]] and [[Atanalcar]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Tindómiel''' was the second child, and only daughter, of [[Elros|Elros Tar-Minyatur]], the first [[King of Númenor]]. Almost nothing is known about her life.{{UT|earlier}} ==Etymology== ''Tindómiel'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but it's listed along with Tinúviel among the examples of the ending ''[[-iel]]'' for "female".{{PE|17}} P190. [[Paul Strack]] suggests it means "Daughter of Twilight" and is a compound of ''[[tindómë]]'' ("twilight") and ''[[-iel]]'' ("daughter", feminine suffix). The [[Sindarin]] name ''Tinúviel'' has the same meaning.{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2039964243.html|articlename=Q. ''Tindómiel'' f.|website=Eldamo|accessed=20 January 2022}} It could also mean "Morning Star" in [[Quenya]] and consist of an assimilation of ''[[tindómë]]'' and ''[[elen|el]]'' ("star"),{{fact}} analogous to [[Arwen]] [[Undómiel]] "Evenstar", who was a cousin of Tindómiel, while [[Tindómerel]] is better documented as meaning "Daughter of Twilight".{{PE|19}} P73 == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | EAR |y| ELW | | | | | | | | | | |EAR=[[Eärendil]]
